title: Organization
description: A recursive schema representing an organization and its members.

members.description: A list of members belonging to the organization.

parent.description: An optional reference to a parent organization (recursive).

Member.description: A person who is a member of the organization.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

role.description: The role of the user in the organization.

joinedAt.description: The timestamp when the user joined the organization.

invitedBy.description: The member who invited this user (recursive reference).
